DOC.brief_title: A Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetic Study Single Dose CMX157 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females nonchildbearing potential , 18 55 year age . Males must able willing use adequate contraceptive method throughout study . 1 . Currently nurse female , pregnant female , female childbearing potential . 2 . Hypersensitivity tenofovir . 3 . Use antiviral , corticosteroid , immunosuppressive , anticoagulant prescription drug within 4 week prior enrollment . Use prescription drug within 14 day prior enrollment . 4 . Use overthecounter medication , herbal/nutraceutical preparation , within 7 day prior enrollment . 5 . Administration potentially nephrotoxic drug within 14 day prior enrollment . 6 . Use investigational drug and/or treatment within 30 day prior enrollment . 7 . Use illicit drug within 6 month prior screen enrollment , base history urine drug screen . 8 . Infection HIV , HBV HCV . 9 . History abuse alcohol substance ( ) within 6 month prior enrollment . 10 . History symptom cardiovascular disease , include limited coronary artery disease , hypertension , congestive heart disease , cardiomyopathy , cardiac conduction disorder . 11 . History clinically significant hypotension ( include orthostatic ) , faint , lightheadedness . 12 . History gastrointestinal disease impairment . 13 . History renal impairment disorder . 14 . History liver disease impairment . 15 . History cancer , except basal cell carcinoma . 16 . History pathologic bone fracture ; history risk osteopenia 17 . History diabetes , metabolic disease , autoimmune disease ; history immunodeficiency healthy volunteer . 18 . Acute illness fever 38 C within 1 week prior enrollment . 19 . Supine blood pressure systolic outside range 90140 mmHg , diastolic outside range 5090 mmHg . 20 . Resting heart rate > 100 < 45 beat per minute . 21 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 31 < 18 , body weight < 50 kg men < 45 kg woman . 22 . Whole blood donation within 56 day plasma donation within 30 day prior enrollment .
